S01bsu078_u:4359: KAvk_22.9 manoratheneti puraḥ prayāte taddarśanāyeva dharādhināthe /

S01bsu078_u:4402: pāṇau ca līlākamalāspade 'smin pātraṃ kathaṃ te priyamadya jātam //
S01bsu078_u:4409: KAvk_22.34 rājan jarārogahateva na syāttaraṅgalolā yadi jīvavṛttiḥ /

S01bsu078_u:4514: saṃvādasaṃsparśasubhāṣitaṃ hi keṣām c asatkārapadaṃ na yāti //

S01bsu078_u:4516: prītyā tamādāya tataḥ sahaiva svarājadhānīmagamat kṛtajñah //
S01bsu078_u:4518: rājyārdhadānābhimukhaḥ sa tasthau cittānuvṛttasya kimasya deyam //

S01bsu078_u:4521: KAvk_22.90 mahmaṃ na rājyādyapi rocate 'rdhamakhaṇḍitālpāpi hi śobhate śrīḥ /

S01bsu078_u:4527: KAvk_22.93 svastyastu rājyāya namaḥ sukhebhyaḥ saṃmohamātā kṣamatāṃ ca lakṣmīḥ /
S01bsu078_u:4529: KAvk_22.94 bhramaṃ vidhatte vidadhāti mūrcchāṃ nipātayatyeva tamastanoti /

S01bsu078_u:4531: KAvk_22.95 ciraṃ vicintyeti sa jātacittaḥ pratyekabodhirvimalaḥ prabhāte /

S01bsu078_u:4537: KAvk_22.98 śrutveti rājñā kathitaṃ tadarthajātaṃ tadabhyarthanayā vidhāya /

S01bsu078_u:4549: yeṣāṃ naiva priyamapi paraṃ putradārādi datvā

S01bsu078_u:4553: KAvk_23.3 purī babhūva viśvākhyā viśvāsavasatiḥ śriyaḥ /

S01bsu078_u:4565: KAvk_23.9 datte rathavare tasmin vismayenākhilo janaḥ /
